Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder and neck section of a brown pottery ribbed jar, the interior is partially covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and very faint traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394181) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394181)
